snippet: Mr. de Blasio was asked point blank about whether he had enough experience to be mayor, especially compared to Mr. Lhota, a former budget director, deputy mayor and chair of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.
abstract: Mr. de Blasio was asked point blank about whether he had enough experience to be mayor, especially compared to Mr. Lhota, a former budget director, deputy mayor and chair of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
